briefdescription.para: Callback that is executed when a button state change is detected.

parameterdescription.para: Bitmask of button states.
Bitmask that shows which buttons have changed.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the library to control the LEDs.

parameterdescription.para: If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the library to read the button state.

parameterdescription.para: Callback handler for button state changes.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Add a dynamic button handler callback.

detaileddescription.para: In addition to the button handler function passed to dk_buttons_init, any number of button handlers can be added and removed at runtime.

parameterdescription.para: Handler structure. Must point to statically allocated memory.

briefdescription.para: Remove a dynamic button handler callback.

parameterdescription.para: Handler to remove.
Successfully removed the handler.
This button handler was not present.
Bitmask of button states.
Bitmask that shows which buttons have changed.

briefdescription.para: Get current button state from internal variable.
Set value of LED pins as specified in one bitmask.

parameterdescription.para: Bitmask that defines which LEDs to turn on and off.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Set value of LED pins as specified in two bitmasks.

parameterdescription.para: Bitmask that defines which LEDs to turn on. If this bitmask overlaps with leds_off_mask, leds_on_mask has priority.
Bitmask that defines which LEDs to turn off. If this bitmask overlaps with leds_on_mask, leds_on_mask has priority.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

detaileddescription.para: This function turns a single LED on or off.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the LED.
Value for the LED: 1 - turn on, 0 - turn off
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.
Index of the LED.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.
Index of the LED.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Module for handling buttons and LEDs on Nordic DKs.
